thread.title: KATHERINE STEINKAMP
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by KATHERINE STEINKAMP

author: KATHERINE STEINKAMP
title: KATHERINE STEINKAMP
text: Ordering merchandise was easy, but finding it on-line was difficult. I tried the on-line chat, but the person who was helping me said they couldn't see sale merchandise on their computer, so I'd have to call the store. Hopefully, delivery goes better. I've heard good reviews about customer service.
